archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.5d: d) gaining independent views of the incident (e.g. from commercial cyber security incident response specialists or peers that have experienced the same (or similar) incidents)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
